steps.name: Given Admin sends Get Request Program for the LMS with request body "GetAllProgramWithInvalidEndpoint"
When Admin sends Get HTTPS Request and request Body with "endpoint" endpoint for Program
Then Admin receives the StatusCode with statusText "GetAllProgramWithInvalidEndpoint" for Program
And Admin receives All Programs "GetAllProgramWithInvalidEndpoint" for Get request
